title: Kerusso Men's Iron Sharpens Iron T-Shirt - Sport Grey -
features: A FUN TESTIMONY: This shirt marks you as top of the class when it comes to following the Good Book and walking the path God has laid out for your life. As believers, our Creator designed us to dwell in community with each other�not to exist in isolation, but to sharpen others� skills and lift each other up.

IRON SHARPENS IRON: Proverbs 27:17 says, "Iron sharpens iron, and one man sharpens another." This ability to help each other grow and thrive in Jesus�s name is a vital element of Christian community. We are called to be part of the process of honing strong Christian character in others and then blessed to find our own character refined in return.

LIGHTWEIGHT WITH A CLASSIC FIT: Graphite heather featuring a periodic table inspired missional graphic, with a 50/50 blend of polyester and cotton and double-needle stitching to guarantee maximum comfort and breathability.

MULTIPLE SIZES AVAILABLE: From Small to 4X-Large, you can be sure to find the perfect size for yourself or as a gift to your pastor or fellow Christian. Ladies may want to order a size down for the best fit.
PRINTED AND SHIPPED FROM THE USA: All Kerusso producted are shipped from within the United States. Find pride in being a part of the mission to share the Christian gospel.
description: Kerusso Christian T-Shirt Iron Sharpens Iron Geek chic meets faith in this scientifically inspired "Iron Sharpens Iron"T-Shirt in Graphite Heather by Kerusso. This shirt marks you as top of the class when it comes to following the Good Book and walking the path God has laid out for your life. As believers, our Creator designed us to dwell in community with each other"not to exist in isolation, but to sharpen others'skills and lift each other up. Proverbs 27:17 says, "Iron sharpens iron, and one man sharpens another."This ability to help each other grow and thrive in Jesus's name is a vital element of Christian community. We are called to be part of the process of honing strong Christian character in others and then blessed to find our own character refined in return. Look around you at work, in class, at church, in your family, and within your neighborhood. Who are you sharpening, and who sharpens your skills and helps you grow your faith? Ask God to give you opportunities to mentor others and to lead you to godly men and women who can help mold a strong Christian character in you. Kerusso Adult T-Shirt "Iron Sharpens Iron" Color: Graphite Heather 50% cotton / 50% polyester Standard fit Preshrunk jersey knit Taped neck and shoulders Double-needle stitched hems
